author: dreiss
msg: Now any "Definition" can be documented, so we can move the docstring stuff
up to a a higher node in the parse tree.
Checked out DocTest.thrift and a few other thrifts.

author: cpiro
msg: Summary: all tTEs were being filtered from the logs; now just tTEs that come from connections closing are suppressed
Test Plan: logs my bug in channel server :)
Notes: adds logic to thrift_logger, not removes (bad news bears)

author: iproctor
msg: Summary: Now closes input channel on close. Also, transport exceptions are cleaner.

author: mcslee
msg: Summary: Use the default TBinaryProtocol constructors for better example.

author: mcslee
msg: Summary: Because we're all about strict aliasing rules in the g++, m'holmbie.
Test Plan: Should be NO compiler warnings about (enum&) -> (int32_t&) typecasting
